0.1.0.name: perldoc-lookup
0.1.0.description: Quickly lookup perldoc on perldoc.perl.org or MetaCPAN.

readme:
A small helper to quickly lookup documentation for Perl code on [perldoc.perl.org](http://perldoc.perl.org) or on [MetaCPAN](https://metacpan.org) (opens a browser window). ## Usage Just place the cursor in a module name, function name or other text that you want to look up, and use the lookup functions provided by the context menu or via the assigned shortcuts:

## Install From the command line: `apm install perldoc-lookup` If the command line isn't your thing: - Go to **Settings > Install** - Search for `perldoc-lookup` and click **Install** - Happy coding! :heart:

metadata.name: perldoc-lookup
